thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Wells Fargo’s Wealth Management Unit Attracts Justice Department Attention

author: Emily Glazer
title: Wells Fargo’s Wealth Management Unit Attracts Justice Department Attention

organizations.name: wealth management unit attracts justice department attention wells fargo & co.

text:
Wells Fargo & Co.’s problems are expanding to its wealth-management business.
The Justice Department in late 2017 told the bank to conduct an independent investigation of its wealth-management business after whistleblowers from the bank cited sales problems to the agency, people familiar with the matter said.
The bank tapped law firm...
